message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動
message.translation: Charge. Press the assigned button and wait for the charge to finish.

message.translation: Charge. Press the assigned button and wait for the charge to finish.

message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動
message.translation: Charge. Press the assigned button and wait for the charge to finish.

message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動 発動後、爆発が出るまでに<PADM>左スティック上下<KEYM>移動キー<KC MOVE_FORWARD><KC MOVE_BACKWARD></KEYM>で攻撃範囲調整
message.translation: Begin casting by pressing the assigned button, and after the chant finishes, release to cause an explosion. The range of the skill can be adjusted by pressing <PADM>Left stick up or down.<KEYM><KC MOVE_FORWARD> or <KC MOVE_BACKWARD></KEYM>

message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で氷塊発現 発現後、<KC ATTACK1><PADM>または<ICON PAD_L2>か<ICON PAD_R2></PADM>を押すと射出 <KC TOUCH>を押すと氷塊解除
message.translation: Begin casting by pressing the assigned button, conjuring a giant snowflake upon completion of the chant, and immediately afterwards press <KC ATTACK1>,<PADM>or <ICON PAD_L2> or <ICON PAD_R2></PADM>. Pressing <KC TOUCH> will release the ice.

message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で魔法杭発現 発現後、再度セットボタンを押すと放電開始
message.translation: Begin casting by pressing the assigned button, conjuring a magickal stake upon completion of the chant, and press the assigned button again to start discharging it.

message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動
セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動
